title: Lebanon - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Lebanon stands at D with n/a outlook. Moody's credit rating for Lebanon was last set at C with n/a outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Lebanon was last reported at RD with n/a outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Lebanon thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Lebanon as reported by major credit rating agencies.
